typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pLote as string,
	pMesAnoRef as string
}
source(output(
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG as string,
		VLR_ORIG_NSFT as decimal(15,2),
		SERIE_NF as string,
		descr_operadora as string,
		COD_IDENT_CLI as string,
		CPF_CNPJ as string,
		VLR_ATRIBUIDO as decimal(15,2),
		DT_ATRIBUICAO as timestamp,
		DT_AJUSTE as timestamp,
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG as timestamp,
		NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL as string,
		DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL as timestamp,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA as timestamp,
		VLR_FATURA as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_DEVEDOR as decimal(15,2),
		UF_FATURA as string,
		TIPO_DOCUMENTO as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		SALDO_POS_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		TIPO_OPERACAO as string,
		DT_VENCTO_FAT_FUTURA as timestamp,
		VLR_AJUSTE_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CREDITO_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_DEVOLUCAO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_FATURA_FUTURA as decimal(15,2),
		COD_FAC_CD as decimal(10,0),
		COD_OPERADORA as string,
		receita_operadora as string,
		COD_CREDITO as decimal(10,2),
		NUM_FATURA_FUTURA as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT np.nota_fiscal_orig AS NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG, np.vlr_orig_nsft AS VLR_ORIG_NSFT, np.serie_nf AS SERIE_NF, np.descr_operadora,np.cod_ident_cli AS COD_IDENT_CLI,np.cpf_cnpj	AS CPF_CNPJ,np.vlr_contestado AS VLR_ATRIBUIDO,np.dt_vencto_boleto_ult AS DT_ATRIBUICAO,np.dt_ajuste AS	DT_AJUSTE,np.cod_motivo_ajuste AS COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE,np.dt_abertura_impug AS	DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG,np.num_fatura_original AS NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL,np.dt_venc_fatura_original AS DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL, np.dt_emissao_fatura AS	DT_EMISSAO_FATURA,np.vlr_fatura AS VLR_FATURA,np.saldo_devedor AS SALDO_DEVEDOR,np.uf_fatura AS UF_FATURA,CASE WHEN np.tipo_documento = 'PF' THEN 'CPF' WHEN np.tipo_documento = 'PJ' THEN 'CNPJ' ELSE NULL END AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO,np.contacontabil AS CONTACONTABIL_CR,np.contacontabil AS CONTACONTABIL_DB,np.descrcontacontabil AS DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_DB,np.descrcontacontabil AS DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_CR,np.saldo_pos_ajuste AS SALDO_POS_AJUSTE,np.tipo_operacao AS	TIPO_OPERACAO,np.dt_venc_fatura_original AS DT_VENCTO_FAT_FUTURA,NULL AS	VLR_AJUSTE_ITEM, NULL AS VLR_CREDITO_AJUSTE, NULL AS VLR_DEVOLUCAO,NULL AS	VLR_FATURA_FUTURA,np.cod_fac_cd AS COD_FAC_CD,np.cod_operadora AS COD_OPERADORA, np.receita_operadora, null AS COD_CREDITO,null AS NUM_FATURA_FUTURA FROM convenio.cvtb_atis_nao_pago np WITH (NOLOCK)  WHERE id_lote_arquivo IN (SELECT id_lote_arquivo FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WITH (NOLOCK)  WHERE ID_LOTE = {$pLote}) UNION ALL SELECT  ap.nota_fiscal_orig AS NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG,ap.vlr_orig_nsft AS VLR_ORIG_NSFT, ap.serie_nf AS SERIE_NF, ap.descr_operadora AS DESCR_OPERADORA, ap.cod_ident_cli AS COD_IDENT_CLI,ap.cpf_cnpj	AS CPF_CNPJ,ap.vlr_credito_item AS	VLR_ATRIBUIDO,ap.dt_vencto_boleto_ult AS DT_ATRIBUICAO,ap.dt_ajuste AS	DT_AJUSTE,ap.cod_motivo_ajuste AS	COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE, ap.dt_abertura_impug AS	DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG,ap.num_fatura_original AS	NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL,ap.dt_venc_fatura_original AS	DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL,ap.dt_emissao_fatura AS DT_EMISSAO_FATURA,ap.vlr_fatura AS	VLR_FATURA,ap.saldo_devedor AS	SALDO_DEVEDOR,ap.uf_fatura AS UF_FATURA,CASE WHEN ap.tipo_documento = 'PF' THEN 'CPF' WHEN ap.tipo_documento = 'PJ' THEN 'CNPJ' ELSE NULL END AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO,ap.contacontabil AS CONTACONTABIL_CR,ap.contacontabil AS CONTACONTABIL_DB, ap.descrcontacontabil AS DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_DB ,ap.descrcontacontabil AS DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_CR,ap.saldo_pos_ajuste	AS SALDO_POS_AJUSTE,ap.tipo_operacao AS	TIPO_OPERACAO,ap.dt_venc_fatura_original AS DT_VENCTO_FAT_FUTURA,ap.vlr_ajuste_item AS	VLR_AJUSTE_ITEM,ap.vlr_credito_ajuste AS VALOR_CREDITO_AJUSTE,ap.vlr_devolucao AS	VLR_DEVOLUCAO,ap.vlr_fatura_futura AS VLR_FATURA_FUTURA,ap.cod_fac_cd AS COD_FAC_CD,ap.cod_operadora AS	COD_OPERADORA,ap.receita_operadora, ap.cod_credito, ap.num_fatura_futura FROM convenio.cvtb_atis_pago ap WITH (NOLOCK)  WHERE id_lote_arquivo IN (SELECT id_lote_arquivo FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WITH (NOLOCK)  WHERE ID_LOTE = {$pLote})"\n),
	format: 'query') ~> TabelaAtis
TabelaAtis derive(id_lote_ajuste = $pLote,
		nome_billing = 'Atis',
		nota_fiscal_orig_normalizado = replace(trim(NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG), right(NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG, 4), ''),
		num_controle_reclamacao_normalizado = concat(trim(SERIE_NF), '123'),
		cd_criado_por = 'Carga ADF - CargaArqAtis',
		dt_criado_em = add(currentTimestamp(), hours(-3)),
		fl_status_geral = 'NT',
		MES_ANO_REF_ARQ = concat(right($pMesAnoRef, 2), left($pMesAnoRef, 4)),
		NUM_ITEM_ESTORNADO = toDecimal(COD_CREDITO, 2)) ~> AdaptaColunas
AdaptaColunas sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID_CONTESTACAO as decimal(28,0),
		ID_CLIENTE as string,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_NF_ORIG as timestamp,
		VLR_ORIG_NSFT as decimal(15,2),
		SERIE_NF as string,
		COD_IDENT_CLI as string,
		CPF_CNPJ as string,
		NOME_CLIENTE as string,
		TERMINAL as string,
		VLR_TOTAL_ATRIBUIDO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_ATRIBUIDO as decimal(15,2),
		DT_ATRIBUICAO as timestamp,
		DT_AJUSTE as timestamp,
		DESCR_OPERADORA as string,
		COD_OPERADORA as string,
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		DESC_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO as string,
		CLASSE_RECEBER as string,
		CONTA_FINANCEIRA as string,
		DESC_CONTA_FINANCEIRA as string,
		NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL as string,
		VLR_DOC_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),
		FATURA_ATRIBUIDA as string,
		VLR_FATURA as decimal(15,2),
		UF_FATURA as string,
		SEQ_RECEBIVEL as string,
		DT_EMISSAO as timestamp,
		MODELO as string,
		NUMORDEMDOITEM as decimal(3,0),
		BC_ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		ALIQUOTA_ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		BC_ICMS_RECALCULADA as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS_RECALCULADO as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS_PARA_RESSARCIMENTO as decimal(15,2),
		SITUACAO as string,
		MES_APURACAO as string,
		TIPO_DOC as decimal(1,0),
		COD_CONSUMIDOR as string,
		CHAVE_AUTENTICACAO as string,
		TOTAL_MESTRE as decimal(15,2),
		BC_ICMS_MESTRE as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS_DESTACADO as decimal(15,2),
		INSCRICAO_ESTADUAL as string,
		RAZAO_SOCIAL as string,
		FL_STATUS_GERAL as string,
		ID_LOTE_AJUSTE as decimal(28,0),
		ID_ENTREGA_RESSARCIMENTO as decimal(28,0),
		CD_ITEM as string,
		DS_ITEM as string,
		HR_AJUSTE as string,
		HR_ATRIBUICAO as string,
		NOME_BILLING as string,
		TIPO_CLIENTE as string,
		DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG as timestamp,
		DT_FECHA_IMPUG as timestamp,
		SALDO_DEVEDOR as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_FATURA_INI as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_FATURA_FIM as decimal(15,2),
		COD_CLIENTE as string,
		TIPO_DOCUMENTO as string,
		NOME_FANTASIA as string,
		COD_GRUPO as string,
		NOME_GRUPO_ECONOMICO as string,
		SEGMENTO_CLIENTE as string,
		SUB_SEGMENTO_CLIENTE as string,
		SEGMENTO_VALOR as string,
		CLASSE_ELEGIBILIDADE as string,
		DESCR_SERV_AJUSTE as string,
		DESCR_SERV as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		SALDO_POS_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		TIPO_OPERACAO as string,
		TIPO_TERMINAL as string,
		DONO_RECEITA as string,
		SUBTYPE_CODE as decimal(19,0),
		TIPO_DESCR_SERV as string,
		DT_VENCTO_FAT_FUTURA as timestamp,
		VLR_IMPOSTO_CONTESTADO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_IMPOSTO_ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_BRUTO_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_OUTROS_IMPOSTOS as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_AJUSTE_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CREDITO_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CREDITO_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_DEVOLUCAO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_FATURA_FUTURA as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CONTESTADO_FUTURO as decimal(15,2),
		LOGIN_ATENDIMENTO as string,
		DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL as timestamp,
		DT_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO as timestamp,
		NUM_ITEM_ESTORNADO as decimal(10,0),
		FLG_RETIFICADO as string,
		TERMINAL_115 as string,
		VALOR_ITEM_115 as decimal(15,2),
		DT_CRIADO_EM as timestamp,
		CD_CRIADO_POR as string,
		DT_ATUALIZADO_EM as timestamp,
		CD_ATUALIZADO_POR as string,
		MES_ANO_FAT_ORIGINAL as string,
		MES_ANO_FAT_AJUSTE as string,
		VLR_PAGAMENTO_FAT_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),
		ID_ITEM_CONVENIO_115 as decimal(28,0),
		NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO_NORMALIZADO as string,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG_NORMALIZADO as string,
		COD_FAC_CD as decimal(10,0),
		CCM_SERVICO_CONTESTADO as string,
		COD_TIPO_RCBL_FATURA as string,
		DESCR_RCBL_FATURA as string,
		DT_PAGAMENTO as timestamp,
		DEBIT_ID as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA_ORIGINAL as timestamp,
		UF_NF as string,
		VLR_PGTO_ALOCADO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_TOTAL_PGTO as decimal(15,2),
		CREDIT_ID as string,
		DT_REFERENCIA as timestamp,
		DT_IMPORTACAO as timestamp,
		STEP_EXECUTION_ID as decimal(18,0),
		JOB_EXECUTION_ID as decimal(18,0),
		ID_MESTRE_CONVENIO_115 as decimal(28,0),
		FL_MANUAL_CONCILIACAO as string,
		DT_CONCILIACAO as timestamp,
		DT_EMISSAO_115 as timestamp,
		MES_ANO_REF_ARQ as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG,
		VLR_ORIG_NSFT,
		SERIE_NF,
		COD_IDENT_CLI,
		CPF_CNPJ,
		VLR_ATRIBUIDO,
		DT_ATRIBUICAO,
		DT_AJUSTE,
		DESCR_OPERADORA = descr_operadora,
		COD_OPERADORA,
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE,
		NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA_ORIGINAL = DT_EMISSAO_FATURA,
		VLR_FATURA,
		UF_FATURA,
		FL_STATUS_GERAL = fl_status_geral,
		ID_LOTE_AJUSTE = id_lote_ajuste,
		NOME_BILLING = nome_billing,
		DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG,
		SALDO_DEVEDOR,
		TIPO_DOCUMENTO,
		CONTACONTABIL_DB,
		CONTACONTABIL_CR,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_DB,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_CR,
		SALDO_POS_AJUSTE,
		TIPO_OPERACAO,
		DT_VENCTO_FAT_FUTURA,
		VLR_AJUSTE_ITEM,
		VLR_CREDITO_AJUSTE,
		VLR_DEVOLUCAO,
		VLR_FATURA_FUTURA,
		DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL,
		DT_CRIADO_EM = dt_criado_em,
		CD_CRIADO_POR = cd_criado_por,
		NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO_NORMALIZADO = num_controle_reclamacao_normalizado,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG_NORMALIZADO = nota_fiscal_orig_normalizado,
		COD_FAC_CD,
		MES_ANO_REF_ARQ,
		DONO_RECEITA = receita_operadora,
		NUM_ITEM_ESTORNADO,
		FATURA_ATRIBUIDA = NUM_FATURA_FUTURA
	)) ~> TabelaCONTESTACAO
